title: The Dragon Maker: A Short Story
description: Christian loves dragons. He's indifferent to people. Because of this, he's perfectly content to live his life as close to a hermit as he could be until a villain bursts through his apartment and changes everything.  “Your dragon just bit me!" Scott yelled indigently. "You broke into my apartment." Christian countered. "And I’m pretty sure you’re a villain. Plus, he’s a baby. Get over it." "I’m feeling very attacked right now." Scott muttered, but he took a step back. (EXCERPT)  A short story in a series of interconnected short stories with aromantic characters and queerplatonic relationships.  THE DRAGON MAKER is roughly 6700 words.
author: Hailey Gonzales
